com.facebook.buck.js

Class ReactNativeBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractBuildRule
      • com.facebook.buck.js.ReactNativeBundle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBuildTarget, BuildRule, AbiRule, java.lang.Comparable<BuildRule>

    public class ReactNativeBundle
extends AbstractBuildRule
implements AbiRule
    Responsible for running the React Native JS packager in order to generate a single .js bundle along with resources referenced by the javascript code.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.rules.keys.AbiRule
